section.heading: Inapplicability of §§ 9-103.01 to 9-103.05 to Interstate System.
section.text: None of the provisions of §§ 9-103.01 to 9-103.05 shall apply to any segment of the Interstate System within the District of Columbia.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: “ Section 9-103.05”, referred to in the heading and text, was repealed by § 711 of D.C. Law 4-201, effective March 10, 1983.
